description: Supply and Delivery of 160 Glazed Curtain Walls to La Macaza
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## 21C31-234453: Supply and Delivery of 160 Glazed Curtain Walls for La Macaza

### Tender Details

* **Solicitation Number:** WS3870366706
* **Publication Date:** September 11, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** October 17, 2023, 14:00 EDT

### Description of Requirements

The Department of Public Works and Government Services, on behalf of the Correctional Service of Canada, invites proposals for the custom manufacturing and delivery of 160 glazed curtain walls to La Macaza, Québec, Canada.

### Bid Requirements and Submission

All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by 14:00 EDT on October 17, 2023. Late bids will be declared non-responsive.

### Contract Details

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
* **Commodity:** Glazed Curtain Walls (UNSPSC 30170000)
* **Service:** Custom Manufacturing
* **Delivery Location:** La Macaza, Québec, Canada

### Supporting Documents

Please refer to Annex ‘’Requirements’’ for detailed information on the bid submission requirements. All bidders must comply with the requirements outlined in this annex.

### Contact Information

* **Contact Name:** Adina Ayassou, Department of Public Works and Government Services
* **Email:** [adina.ayassou@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:adina.ayassou@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Notice and Attachments

This notice may be accessed online at https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17414606?extsite=MTc0MTQ2MDZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==. No attachment is available at this time. 

### Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
